verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣סֶף <S%H3254><s%> add אִ֭יּוֹב <S%H347><s%> Moreover Job שְׂאֵ֥ת <S%H5375><s%> accept מְשָׁל֗וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> [As] God הֵסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> [who] hath taken away מִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <S%H4941><s%> my judgment וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> and the Almighty הֵמַ֥ר <S%H4843><s%> [who] hath vexed נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All
ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> All the while נִשְׁמָתִ֣י <S%H5397><s%> my breath בִ֑י וְר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> [is] in me and the spirit אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> of God בְּאַפִּֽי׃ <S%H639><s%> [is] in my nostrils

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> certainly תְּדַבֵּ֣רְנָה <S%H1696><s%> shall not speak שְׂפָתַ֣י <S%H8193><s%> My lips עַוְלָ֑ה <S%H5766><s%> wickedness וּ֝לְשׁוֹנִ֗י <S%H3956><s%> nor my tongue אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Nor יֶהְגֶּ֥ה <S%H1897><s%> utter רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> deceit

חָלִ֣ילָה <S%H2486><s%> God forbid לִּי֮ אִם־ <S%H518><s%> should אַצְדִּ֪יק <S%H6663><s%> that I should justify אֶ֫תְכֶ֥ם <S%H853><s%> עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Till אֶגְוָ֑ע <S%H1478><s%> you till I die לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אָסִ֖יר <S%H5493><s%> I will not remove תֻּמָּתִ֣י <S%H8538><s%> mine integrity מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

בְּצִדְקָתִ֣י <S%H6666><s%> My righteousness הֶ֭חֱזַקְתִּי <S%H2388><s%> I hold וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and will not אַרְפֶּ֑הָ <S%H7503><s%> fast and will not let it go לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יֶחֱרַ֥ף <S%H2778><s%> shall not reproach לְ֝בָבִ֗י <S%H3824><s%> my heart מִיָּמָֽי׃ <S%H3117><s%> [me] so long as I live

יְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כְ֭רָשָׁע <S%H7563><s%> be as the wicked אֹ֣יְבִ֑י <S%H341><s%> Let mine enemy וּמִתְקוֹמְמִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> and he that riseth up כְעַוָּֽל׃ <S%H5767><s%> against me as the unrighteous

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> when מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תִּקְוַ֣ת <S%H8615><s%> For what [is] the hope חָ֭נֵף <S%H2611><s%> of the hypocrite כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When יִבְצָ֑ע <S%H1214><s%> though he hath gained כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When יֵ֖שֶׁל <S%H7953><s%> taketh away אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> when God נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> any

הַֽ֭צַעֲקָתוֹ <S%H6818><s%> his cry יִשְׁמַ֥ע ׀ <S%H8085><s%> hear אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> Will God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> when trouble אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and
שַׁדַּ֥י <S%H7706><s%> Almighty יִתְעַנָּ֑ג <S%H6026><s%> Will he delight יִקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> call אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵֽת׃ <S%H6256><s%> after

אוֹרֶ֣ה <S%H3384><s%> I will teach אֶתְכֶ֣ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> you by the hand אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> What עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> is with שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> [that] which [is] with the Almighty לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲכַחֵֽד׃ <S%H3582><s%> will I not conceal

הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you כֻּלְּכֶ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all חֲזִיתֶ֑ם <S%H2372><s%> Behold all ye yourselves have seen וְלָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּ֝֗ה <S%H2088><s%> then הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [it] why then are ye thus altogether תֶּהְבָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H1891><s%> vain

זֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> This חֵֽלֶק־ <S%H2506><s%> This [is] the portion אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> man רָשָׁ֥ע ׀ <S%H7563><s%> of a wicked עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> from אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> with God וְֽנַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> and the heritage עָ֝רִיצִ֗ים <S%H6184><s%> of oppressors מִשַּׁדַּ֥י <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> [which] they shall receive

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> be multiplied בָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> If his children לְמוֹ־ <S%H3926><s%> [it is] for חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword וְ֝צֶאֱצָאָ֗יו <S%H6631><s%> and his offspring לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׂבְּעוּ־ <S%H7646><s%> shall not be satisfied לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> with bread

[שְׂרִידֹו כ] (רִידָיו <S%H8300><s%> alive ק) בַּמָּ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> in death יִקָּבֵ֑רוּ <S%H6912><s%> of him shall be buried וְ֝אַלְמְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H490><s%> and his widows לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not be able תִבְכֶּֽינָה׃ <S%H1058><s%> shall not weep

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יִצְבֹּ֣ר <S%H6651><s%> Though he heap up כֶּעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> as the dust כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver וְ֝כַחֹ֗מֶר <S%H2563><s%> as the clay יָכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> and prepare מַלְבּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H4403><s%> raiment

יָ֭כִין <S%H3559><s%> He may prepare וְצַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> [it] but the just יִלְבָּ֑שׁ <S%H3847><s%> shall put [it] on וְ֝כֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the silver נָקִ֥י <S%H5355><s%> and the innocent יַחֲלֹֽק׃ <S%H2505><s%> shall divide

בָּנָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> He buildeth כָעָ֣שׁ <S%H6211><s%> as a moth בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> his house וּ֝כְסֻכָּ֗ה <S%H5521><s%> and as a booth עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> maketh נֹצֵֽר׃ <S%H5341><s%> [that] the keeper

עָשִׁ֣יר <S%H6223><s%> The rich יִ֭שְׁכַּב <S%H7901><s%> man shall lie down וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> never יֵאָסֵ֑ף <S%H622><s%> but he shall not be gathered עֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes פָּקַ֣ח <S%H6491><s%> he openeth וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> is no

תַּשִּׂיגֵ֣הוּ <S%H5381><s%> take hold כַ֭מַּיִם <S%H4325><s%> on him as waters בַּלָּה֑וֹת <S%H1091><s%> Terrors לַ֝֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night גְּנָבַ֥תּוּ <S%H1589><s%> stealeth him away סוּפָֽה׃ <S%H5492><s%> a tempest

יִשָּׂאֵ֣הוּ <S%H5375><s%> wind carrieth him away קָדִ֣ים <S%H6921><s%> The east וְיֵלַ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> is gone וִֽ֝ישָׂעֲרֵ֗הוּ <S%H8175><s%> and as a storm hurleth מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> him out of his place

וְיַשְׁלֵ֣ךְ <S%H7993><s%> For [God] shall cast עָ֭לָיו <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without יַחְמֹ֑ל <S%H2550><s%> upon him and not spare מִ֝יָּד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> out of his hand בָּר֥וֹחַ <S%H1272><s%> he would fain יִבְרָֽח׃ <S%H1272><s%> flee

יִשְׂפֹּ֣ק <S%H5606><s%> [Men] shall clap עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> and כַפֵּ֑ימוֹ <S%H3709><s%> their hands וְיִשְׁרֹ֥ק <S%H8319><s%> at him and shall hiss עָ֝לָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> from מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> him out of his place
